entry.title: Binance and Gulf Energy Forge Partnership for Thailand Crypto Exchange Launch

The venture has received approval from the Thai Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as on November 10. Binance and Gulf Energy to Unveil Thai Crypto Exchange This move follows Gulf Binance's receipt of digital asset operator licenses from Thailandâ€™s Ministry of Finance on May 26. entry.title: New York Tightens Crypto Regulations, Issues New Rules For Listing And Delisting
entry.summary:
The New York Department of Financial Services (NYDFS), overseeing the cityâ€™s financial ecosystem and responsible for the crypto regulations in New York, issued new guidance on crypto on Wednesday. The newly proposed measures aim to protect consumers and bring more transparency to crypto platforms operating in New York.Â
The NYDFS-delivered new crypto rules mandate that licensees only list and delist a crypto coin if they notify the authority about it. Licensed entities must also submit their policies to the department on how they list and delist a crypto token.
According to the proposed regulations, crypto entities cannot self-certify a crypto asset for trading until they secure regulatory approval over their policies.Â
The news release reads:
VC Entities that had a previously â€¦

Market rumors suggest that Bitgetxâ€™s decision not to seek the license may be linked to the rumored Bitget acquisition of OSL, a licensed Hong Kong exchange.

Bitgetx, the subsidiary of the Singapore-based cryptocurrency exchange Bitget, announced on Nov. 13 that it had dropped its pursuit of a Virtual Asset Trading Platform (VATP) license in Hong Kong. As a consequence, Bitgetx said its Hong Kong website â€” www.Bitgetx.hk â€” will cease operations and permanently exit Hong Kong on Dec. 13.
The crypto platform said users from the region should remove their assets before this date. Users who fail to do so will permaâ€¦

entry.title: Ethereum Whistleblower Backs Cardano As His Top Pick In Crypto, Hereâ€™s Why
entry.summary:
Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has recently revisited Plasma, a scaling solution introduced in 2017. His recent post on X â€œExit games for EVM validiums: the return of Plasmaâ€ has reignited a discussion on blockchain scalability and efficiency.
However, this move has not gone without criticism, especially from the Cardano community, which views Ethereumâ€™s renewed interest in Plasma as a potential replication of ideas from its own layer-2 scalability solution, Hydra.
Hydra, developed by Cardano, aims to enhance transaction speeds and overall network scalability through state channels, a concept bearing similarities to Plasma. This parallel has not escaped the notice of Steven Nerayoff, an Ethereum whistleblower known for his outspoken views on Vitalik Buterin, Joseph Lubin and Etherâ€¦

IRSâ€™ Pig Butchering Crypto Scam Warning
The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) issued a warning regarding pig butchering crypto scams on Monday during the International Fraud Awareness Week. The U.S. tax authority wrote:
IRS Criminal Investigation (CI) special agents are seeing pig butchering schemes pop up across the globe.
CI is the criminal investigative arm of the IRS, responsible for conducting financial crime investigations, including tax fraud, narcotics trafficking, money launderâ€¦

entry.summary: Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin interviews Midnight Society Studio Head Rob Bowling about Deadrop's development and Snapshot VII.

entry.title: Game Review: 'Raini: The Lords of Light' Brands Itself With Memes
entry.summary: Raini: Lords of Light is an NFT-optional card game bursting with crypto memes. From SBF to CZ and Elon, this free-to-play game has some truly wild animations. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares his honest thoughts on the game.

entry.title: Art Blocks Marfa Weekend Recap
entry.summary: Relive the Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023 event with this highlights video, produced by Vincent Roazzi Jr. for Decrypt Studios in partnership with Art Blocks.
